post.author: The Duke
post.body:
Hi !
I have a little request,
Where can I find some real weapons models (like AK47, Desert eagle... etc) so i can use them for a Doom3 mod
I know that such weapons models are used in the FMJ556 mod, but I don't know if I can use them (I've mailed them, but no answer yet :p)
Thanks

post.author: The Duke
post.body:
Well, thanks for the link
But, what I want is MD5 models and animations like those in "models/weapons/shotgun_view" or "models/weapons/chaingun_view"
arms, weapon and animation :p

Thanks again for the link ! might be very useful

post.author: The Duke
post.body:
I've got an answer from FMJ team...
I can't use their models
Any help ??

post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body:
I think you need a modeler and an animator
Don't think there are free weapon models ready to be used for D3.
